players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Only 1 mafia remains among Alice or Charlie. Detective, please reveal if you have a result. If not, Alice and Charlie: where were your heads last night? Any theories on why Diana was killed?"
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. Bob, please vote Alice with me to end this now."

You: "A detective claiming on Day 1 with no counterclaim is risky. Charlie, why would mafia kill Diana over you if you’re detective? Feels like you’re pocketing Bob. Bob, let’s not rush—what was Diana’s stance?"

Charlie: "Bob, there’s no counterclaim—standard is to trust the D1 detective. Mafia killed Diana because she was a safe NK; killing me immediately would confirm I’m real. Alice is stalling. Please vote Alice."

Bob: "Alice, full claim please: what’s your role and last-night actions/thoughts? Charlie, specify your exact result phrasing and why Diana over you. If no CC after this, I’m inclined to follow the detective."
You: remained silent.
